subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The glove of first baseman Teixeira and the pitching of closer Betances helped the visiting Yankees escape two late jams and gain a victory in the finale of a three-game series against the Angels.
snippet: The glove of first baseman Teixeira and the pitching of closer Betances helped the visiting Yankees escape two late jams and gain a victory in the finale of a three-game series against the Angels.
